trans-unit.source: DROP OWNED drops all the objects within the current database that are owned by one of the specified roles. Any privileges granted to the given roles on objects in the current database or on shared objects (databases, tablespaces) will also be revoked.
trans-unit.target: DROP OWNED 删除当前数据库中由指定角色之一拥有的所有对象。在当前数据库中的对象或共享对象（数据库，表空间）上授予给定角色的任何特权也将被撤销。

trans-unit.source: DROP OWNED is often used to prepare for the removal of one or more roles. Because DROP OWNED only affects the objects in the current database, it is usually necessary to execute this command in each database that contains objects owned by a role that is to be removed.
trans-unit.target: DROP OWNED 通常用于准备删除一个或多个角色。由于 DROP OWNED 仅影响当前数据库中的对象，因此通常需要在每个数据库中执行此命令，该数据库包含要删除的角色拥有的对象。

trans-unit.source: DROP POLICY removes the specified policy from the table. Note that if the last policy is removed for a table and the table still has row level security enabled via ALTER TABLE, then the default-deny policy will be used. ALTER TABLE ... DISABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY can be used to disable row level security for a table, whether policies for the table exist or not.
trans-unit.target: DROP POLICY 从表中删除指定的策略。请注意，如果删除了表的最后一个策略，并且该表仍通过 ALTER TABLE 启用了行级安全性，则将使用default-deny策略。 ALTER TABLE ... DISABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY 可用于禁用表的行级安全性，无论该表的策略是否存在。

trans-unit.source: DROP PROCEDURE removes the definition of an existing procedure. To execute this command the user must be the owner of the procedure. The argument types to the procedure must be specified, since several different procedures can exist with the same name and different argument lists.
trans-unit.target: DROP PROCEDURE 删除现有过程的定义。要执行此命令，用户必须是过程的所有者。必须指定过程的参数类型，因为可以存在多个具有相同名称和不同参数列表的不同过程。

trans-unit.source: DROP PUBLICATION removes an existing publication from the database.
trans-unit.target: DROP PUBLICATION 从数据库中删除现有发布。

trans-unit.source: DROP ROLE removes the specified role(s). To drop a superuser role, you must be a superuser yourself; to drop non-superuser roles, you must have CREATEROLE privilege.
trans-unit.target: DROP ROLE 删除指定的角色。要放弃超级用户角色，您必须自己是超级用户；否则，您必须成为超级用户。要放弃非超级用户角色，您必须具有 CREATEROLE 特权。

trans-unit.source: DROP ROUTINE removes the definition of an existing routine, which can be an aggregate function, a normal function, or a procedure. See under DROP AGGREGATE, DROP FUNCTION, and DROP PROCEDURE for the description of the parameters, more examples, and further details.
trans-unit.target: DROP ROUTINE 删除现有例程的定义，该例程可以是聚合函数，普通函数或过程。有关参数的说明，更多示例和更多详细信息，请参见DROP AGGREGATE，DROP FUNCTION和DROP PROCEDURE下。

trans-unit.source: DROP RULE is a PostgreSQL language extension, as is the entire query rewrite system.
trans-unit.target: DROP RULE 和整个查询重写系统一样，是PostgreSQL语言的扩展。

trans-unit.source: DROP SCHEMA is fully conforming with the SQL standard, except that the standard only allows one schema to be dropped per command, and apart from the IF EXISTS option, which is a PostgreSQL extension.
trans-unit.target: DROP SCHEMA 完全符合SQL标准，除了该标准仅允许每个命令删除一个模式，并且除了 IF EXISTS 选项（它是PostgreSQL扩展）之外。

trans-unit.source: DROP SCHEMA removes schemas from the database.
trans-unit.target: DROP SCHEMA 从数据库中删除模式。

trans-unit.source: DROP SEQUENCE conforms to the SQL standard, except that the standard only allows one sequence to be dropped per command, and apart from the IF EXISTS option, which is a PostgreSQL extension.
trans-unit.target: DROP SEQUENCE 符合SQL标准，但该标准仅允许每个命令删除一个序列，并且除了 IF EXISTS 选项（它是PostgreSQL扩展）外。

trans-unit.source: DROP SEQUENCE removes sequence number generators. A sequence can only be dropped by its owner or a superuser.
trans-unit.target: DROP SEQUENCE 删除序列号生成器。序列只能由其所有者或超级用户删除。

trans-unit.source: DROP SERVER conforms to ISO/IEC 9075-9 (SQL/MED). The IF EXISTS clause is a PostgreSQL extension.
trans-unit.target: DROP SERVER 符合ISO / IEC 9075-9（SQL / MED）。该 IF EXISTS 子句是PostgreSQL扩展。

trans-unit.source: DROP SERVER removes an existing foreign server descriptor. To execute this command, the current user must be the owner of the server.
trans-unit.target: DROP SERVER 删除现有的外部服务器描述符。要执行此命令，当前用户必须是服务器的所有者。

trans-unit.source: DROP STATISTICS removes statistics object(s) from the database. Only the statistics object's owner, the schema owner, or a superuser can drop a statistics object.
trans-unit.target: DROP STATISTICS 从数据库中删除统计信息对象。只有统计对象的所有者，架构所有者或超级用户才能删除统计对象。

trans-unit.source: DROP SUBSCRIPTION cannot be executed inside a transaction block if the subscription is associated with a replication slot. (You can use ALTER SUBSCRIPTION to unset the slot.)
trans-unit.target: DROP SUBSCRIPTION 如果预订与复制插槽关联，则无法在事务块内部执行DROP SUBSCRIPTION。（您可以使用 ALTER SUBSCRIPTION 取消设置插槽。）

trans-unit.source: DROP SUBSCRIPTION removes a subscription from the database cluster.
trans-unit.target: DROP SUBSCRIPTION 从数据库集群中删除预订。

trans-unit.source: DROP TABLE always removes any indexes, rules, triggers, and constraints that exist for the target table. However, to drop a table that is referenced by a view or a foreign-key constraint of another table, CASCADE must be specified. (CASCADE will remove a dependent view entirely, but in the foreign-key case it will only remove the foreign-key constraint, not the other table entirely.)
trans-unit.target: DROP TABLE 始终删除目标表存在的所有索引，规则，触发器和约束。但是，要删除由视图或另一个表的外键约束引用的表，必须指定 CASCADE 。（ CASCADE 将完全删除一个依赖视图，但在外键情况下，它将仅删除外键约束，而不是另一个表。）

trans-unit.source: DROP TABLE removes tables from the database. Only the table owner, the schema owner, and superuser can drop a table. To empty a table of rows without destroying the table, use DELETE or TRUNCATE.
trans-unit.target: DROP TABLE 从数据库中删除表。只有表所有者，模式所有者和超级用户可以删除表。要清空表而不破坏表，请使用DELETE或TRUNCATE。

trans-unit.source: DROP TABLESPACE can only succeed if the tablespace is empty. Some standby users may be actively using the tablespace via their temp_tablespaces parameter. If there are temporary files in the tablespace, all active queries are canceled to ensure that temporary files are removed, so the tablespace can be removed and WAL replay can continue.
trans-unit.target: DROP TABLESPACE 仅当表空间为空时，DROP TABLESPACE才能成功。一些备用用户可能通过其 temp_tablespaces 参数正在积极使用表空间。如果表空间中有临时文件，则将取消所有活动查询以确保删除了临时文件，因此可以删除表空间，并且WAL重播可以继续。

trans-unit.source: DROP TABLESPACE cannot be executed inside a transaction block.
trans-unit.target: DROP TABLESPACE 无法在事务块内执行。

trans-unit.source: DROP TABLESPACE removes a tablespace from the system.
trans-unit.target: DROP TABLESPACE 从系统中删除表空间。

trans-unit.source: DROP TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION drops an existing text search configuration. To execute this command you must be the owner of the configuration.
trans-unit.target: DROP TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION 删除现有的文本搜索配置。要执行此命令，您必须是配置的所有者。

trans-unit.source: DROP TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY drops an existing text search dictionary. To execute this command you must be the owner of the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: DROP TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY 删除现有的文本搜索词典。要执行此命令，您必须是字典的所有者。

trans-unit.source: DROP TEXT SEARCH PARSER drops an existing text search parser. You must be a superuser to use this command.
trans-unit.target: DROP TEXT SEARCH PARSER 删除现有的文本搜索解析器。您必须是超级用户才能使用此命令。

trans-unit.source: DROP TEXT SEARCH TEMPLATE drops an existing text search template. You must be a superuser to use this command.
trans-unit.target: DROP TEXT SEARCH TEMPLATE 删除现有的文本搜索模板。您必须是超级用户才能使用此命令。

trans-unit.source: DROP TRANSFORM removes a previously defined transform.
trans-unit.target: DROP TRANSFORM 删除以前定义的变换。

trans-unit.source: DROP TRIGGER removes an existing trigger definition. To execute this command, the current user must be the owner of the table for which the trigger is defined.
trans-unit.target: DROP TRIGGER 删除现有的触发器定义。要执行此命令，当前用户必须是为其定义触发器的表的所有者。

trans-unit.source: DROP TYPE removes a user-defined data type. Only the owner of a type can remove it.
trans-unit.target: DROP TYPE 删除用户定义的数据类型。只有类型的所有者才能将其删除。

trans-unit.source: DROP USER MAPPING conforms to ISO/IEC 9075-9 (SQL/MED). The IF EXISTS clause is a PostgreSQL extension.
trans-unit.target: DROP USER MAPPING 符合ISO / IEC 9075-9（SQL / MED）。该 IF EXISTS 子句是PostgreSQL扩展。

trans-unit.source: DROP USER MAPPING removes an existing user mapping from foreign server.
trans-unit.target: DROP USER MAPPING 从外部服务器中删除现有的用户映射。
